00032         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00033         OgreOggStreamWavSound::OgreOggStreamWavSound(const Ogre::String& name) : OgreOggISound(name)
00034         {
00035                 mStream=true;
00036                 for ( int i=0; i<NUM_BUFFERS; i++ ) mBuffers[i]=0;              
00037                 mStreamEOF=false;       
00038                 mFormatData=0;
00039         }
00040         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00041         OgreOggStreamWavSound::~OgreOggStreamWavSound()
00042         {
00043                 _release();
00044                 for ( int i=0; i<NUM_BUFFERS; i++ ) mBuffers[i]=0;              
00045                 if (mFormatData) delete mFormatData;
00046         }
00047         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00048         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::open(Ogre::DataStreamPtr& fileStream)
00049         {
00050                 // WAVE descriptor vars
00051                 char*   sound_buffer=0;
00052                 char    id[5]={0}; 
00053                 WORD    format_tag;
00054                 DWORD   size; 
00055                 int             bytesRead=0;
00056 
00057                 // Store stream pointer
00058                 mAudioStream = fileStream;
00059 
00060                 // Read in "RIFF" chunk descriptor (4 bytes)
00061                 mAudioStream->read(id, 4); 
00062 
00063                 // Valid RIFF?
00064                 if (!strcmp(id, "RIFF"))
00065                 { 
00066                         // Read in chunk size (4 bytes)
00067                         mAudioStream->read(&size, 4);                                   
00068 
00069                         // Read in "WAVE" format descriptor (4 bytes)
00070                         mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                              
00071 
00072                         // Valid wav?
00073                         if (!strcmp(id,"WAVE"))
00074                         { 
00075                                 // Create format struct
00076                                 if (!mFormatData) mFormatData = new WavFormatData;
00077 
00078                                 // Read in "fmt" id ( 4 bytes ) 
00079                                 mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                      
00080 
00081                                 // Read in "fmt" chunk size ( 4 bytes ) 
00082                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mFormatChunkSize, 4);
00083 
00084                                 // Should be 16 unless compressed ( compressed NOT supported )
00085                                 if ( mFormatData->mFormatChunkSize>=16 )
00086                                 {
00087                                         // Read in audio format  ( 2 bytes ) 
00088                                         mAudioStream->read(&format_tag, 2);             
00089 
00090                                         // PCM == 1
00091                                         if (format_tag==0x0001 || format_tag==0xFFFE)
00092                                         {
00093                                                 // Read in num channels ( 2 bytes ) 
00094                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mNumChannels, 2);                      
00095 
00096                                                 // Read in sample rate ( 4 bytes ) 
00097                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mSampleRate, 4);               
00098 
00099                                                 // Read in byte rate ( 4 bytes ) 
00100                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec, 4);   
00101 
00102                                                 // Read in byte align ( 2 bytes ) 
00103                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mBlockAlign, 2);               
00104 
00105                                                 // Read in bits per sample ( 2 bytes ) 
00106                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mBitsPerSample, 2);    
00107 
00108                                                 // If WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE...
00109                                                 if (format_tag==0xFFFE)
00110                                                 {
00111                                                         WORD sigBitsPerSample;
00112                                                         WORD extraInfoSize;
00113 
00114                                                         // Read in significant bits per sample ( 2 bytes ) 
00115                                                         mAudioStream->read(&sigBitsPerSample, 2);       
00116                                                         
00117                                                         // Read in extra info size ( 2 bytes ) 
00118                                                         mAudioStream->read(&extraInfoSize, 2);  
00119 
00120                                                         // Read in samples ( 2 bytes ) 
00121                                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mSamples, 2);  
00122 
00123                                                         // Read in channel mask ( 2 bytes ) 
00124                                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mChannelMask, 2);      
00125                                                         
00126                                                         // Read in sub format ( 16 bytes ) 
00127                                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mSubFormat, sizeof(GUID));     
00128                                                 }
00129 
00130 
00131                                                 // Read in chunk id ( 4 bytes ) 
00132                                                 mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                      
00133 
00134                                                 if ( !strcmp(id, "data") )
00135                                                 {
00136                                                         // Read in size of audio data ( 4 bytes ) 
00137                                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mDataSize, 4);         
00138 
00139                                                         // Store byte offset of start of audio data
00140                                                         mFormatData->mAudioOffset = static_cast<DWORD>(mAudioStream->tell());
00141                                                 }
00142                                                 else
00143                                                 {
00144                                                         // Find "data" chunk
00145                                                         try
00146                                                         {
00147                                                                 do
00148                                                                 {
00149                                                                         DWORD chunkSize;
00150 
00151                                                                         // Read in size of chunk data ( 4 bytes ) 
00152                                                                         mAudioStream->read(&chunkSize, 4);              
00153 
00154                                                                         // Skip chunk
00155                                                                         mAudioStream->skip(chunkSize);
00156 
00157                                                                         // Read next chunk id
00158                                                                         mAudioStream->read(id, 4); 
00159                                                                 }
00160                                                                 while ( strcmp(id, "data") || mAudioStream->eof() );
00161 
00162                                                                 // Validity check
00163                                                                 if (!mAudioStream->eof())
00164                                                                 {
00165                                                                         // Read in size of audio data ( 4 bytes ) 
00166                                                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData->mDataSize, 4);         
00167 
00168                                                                         // Store byte offset of start of audio data
00169                                                                         mFormatData->mAudioOffset = static_cast<DWORD>(mAudioStream->tell());
00170                                                                 }
00171                                                                 else
00172                                                                 {
00173                                                                         throw std::string("No WAVE data!");
00174                                                                 }
00175                                                         }
00176                                                         catch(...)
00177                                                         {
00178                                                                 throw std::string("Incomplete WAVE file!");
00179                                                         }
00180                                                 }
00181                                         }
00182                                         else
00183                                         {
00184                                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - No 'data' chunk!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00185                                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00186                                         }
00187                                 }
00188                                 else
00189                                 {
00190                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Compressed WAVE files not supported!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00191                                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00192                                 }
00193                         }
00194                         else
00195                         {
00196                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Not a valid WAVE file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00197                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200                 else
00201                 {
00202                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Not a vlid RIFF file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00203                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 // Generate audio buffers
00207                 alGenBuffers(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00208 
00209                 // Upload to XRAM buffers if available
00210                 if ( OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().hasXRamSupport() )
00211                         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().setXRamBuffer(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00212 
00213                 // Check format support
00214                 if (!_queryBufferInfo()) 
00215                 {
00216                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Format NOT supported");
00217                         throw std::string("Format NOT supported!");
00218                 }
00219 
00220         }
00221         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00222         bool OgreOggStreamWavSound::_queryBufferInfo()
00223         {
00224                 if (!mFormatData) return false;
00225 
00226                 switch(mFormatData->mNumChannels)
00227                 {
00228                 case 1:
00229                         {
00230                                 if ( mFormatData->mBitsPerSample==8 )
00231                                 {
00232                                         // 8-bit mono
00233                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO8;
00234 
00235                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00236                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData->mSampleRate/4;
00237                                 }
00238                                 else
00239                                 {
00240                                         // 16-bit mono
00241                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00242 
00243                                         // Queue 250ms of audio data
00244                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00245                 
00246                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00247                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00248                                 }
00249                         }
00250                         break;
00251                 case 2:
00252                         {
00253                                 if ( mFormatData->mBitsPerSample==8 )
00254                                 {
00255                                         // 8-bit stereo
00256                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO8;
00257 
00258                                         // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 2 (8bit stereo) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00259                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData->mSampleRate >> 1;
00260 
00261                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00262                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 2);
00263                                 }
00264                                 else
00265                                 {
00266                                         // 16-bit stereo
00267                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00268 
00269                                         // Queue 250ms of audio data
00270                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00271 
00272                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00273                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00274                                 }
00275                         }
00276                         break;
00277                 case 4:
00278                         {
00279                                 // 16-bit Quad surround
00280                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_QUAD16");
00281                                 if (!mFormat) return false; 
00282 
00283                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00284                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00285 
00286                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00287                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00288                         }
00289                         break;
00290                 case 6:
00291                         {
00292                                 // 16-bit 5.1 surround
00293                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_51CHN16");
00294                                 if (!mFormat) return false; 
00295 
00296                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00297                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00298 
00299                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00300                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00301                         }
00302                         break;
00303                 case 7:
00304                         {
00305                                 // 16-bit 6.1 surround
00306                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_61CHN16");
00307                                 if (!mFormat) return false; 
00308 
00309                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00310                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00311 
00312                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00313                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00314                         }
00315                         break;
00316                 case 8:
00317                         {
00318                                 // 16-bit 7.1 surround
00319                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_71CHN16");
00320                                 if (!mFormat) return false; 
00321 
00322                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00323                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00324 
00325                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00326                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00327                         }
00328                         break;
00329                 default:
00330                         {
00331                                 // Error message
00332                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Unable to determine number of channels: defaulting to 16-bit stereo");
00333 
00334                                 // 16-bit stereo
00335                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00336 
00337                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00338                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00339 
00340                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00341                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData->mBlockAlign);
00342                         }
00343                         break;
00344                 }
00345                 return true;
00346         }
00347         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00348         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_release()
00349         {               
00350                 ALuint src=AL_NONE;
00351                 setSource(src);
00352                 alDeleteBuffers(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00353         }
00354         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00355         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_prebuffer()
00356         {       
00357                 if (mSource==AL_NONE) return;
00358 
00359                 int i=0;
00360                 while ( i<NUM_BUFFERS )
00361                 {
00362                         if ( _stream(mBuffers[i]) ) 
00363                                 alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &mBuffers[i++]);
00364                         else
00365                                 break;
00366                 }
00367         }
00368         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00369         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::setSource(ALuint& src)
00370         {
00371                 if (src!=AL_NONE)
00372                 {
00373                         // Set source
00374                         mSource=src;
00375 
00376                         // Fill data buffers
00377                         _prebuffer();
00378 
00379                         // Init source
00380                         _initSource();
00381                 }
00382                 else
00383                 {                       
00384                         // Unqueue buffers
00385                         _dequeue();
00386 
00387                         // Set source
00388                         mSource=src;
00389                 }
00390         }
00391         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00392         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_updateAudioBuffers()
00393         {       
00394                 if(mSource == AL_NONE || !mPlay) return;        
00395 
00396                 ALenum state;    
00397                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state); 
00398 
00399                 if (state == AL_STOPPED)
00400                 {
00401                         if(mStreamEOF)
00402                         {
00403                                 stop();
00404                                 // Finished callback
00405                                 if ( mFinishedCB && mFinCBEnabled ) 
00406                                         mFinishedCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00407                                 return;
00408                         }
00409                         else 
00410                         {
00411                                 alSourcePlay(mSource);  
00412                         }
00413                 }       
00414 
00415                 int processed;
00416 
00417                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &processed);
00418 
00419                 while(processed--)
00420                 {
00421                         ALuint buffer;          
00422 
00423                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);                  
00424                         if ( _stream(buffer) ) alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);               
00425                 }       
00426         }
00427         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00428         bool OgreOggStreamWavSound::_stream(ALuint buffer)
00429         {
00430                 std::vector<char> audioData;
00431                 char* data;             
00432                 int  bytes = 0;
00433                 int  result = 0;        
00434 
00435                 // Create buffer
00436                 data = new char[mBufferSize];
00437 
00438                 // Read only what was asked for
00439                 while(static_cast<int>(audioData.size()) < mBufferSize)
00440                 {
00441                         // Read up to a buffer's worth of data
00442                         bytes = static_cast<int>(mAudioStream->read(data, mBufferSize));
00443                         // EOF check
00444                         if (mAudioStream->eof()) 
00445                         {
00446                                 // If set to loop wrap to start of stream
00447                                 if ( mLoop )
00448                                 {
00449                                         mAudioStream->seek(mFormatData->mAudioOffset);
00460                                         if ( mLoopCB && mLoopCBEnabled )
00461                                                 mLoopCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00462                                 }
00463                                 else
00464                                 {
00465                                         mStreamEOF=true;
00466                                         // EOF - finish.
00467                                         if (bytes==0) break;
00468                                 }
00469                         }
00470                         // Append to end of buffer
00471                         audioData.insert(audioData.end(), data, data + bytes);
00472                         // Keep track of read data
00473                         result+=bytes;
00474                 }
00475 
00476                 // EOF
00477                 if(result == 0) 
00478                 {
00479                         delete [] data;
00480                         return false;
00481                 }
00482 
00483                 alGetError();
00484                 // Copy buffer data
00485                 alBufferData(buffer, mFormat, &audioData[0], static_cast<ALsizei>(audioData.size()), mFormatData->mSampleRate);
00486 
00487                 // Cleanup
00488                 delete [] data;
00489 
00490                 return true;
00491         }
00492         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00493         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_dequeue()
00494         {               
00495                 if(mSource == AL_NONE)
00496                         return;
00497                 
00498                 int queued=0;
00499 
00500                 alGetError();
00501 
00502                 // Stop source to allow unqueuing
00503                 alSourceStop(mSource);
00504 
00505                 // Get number of buffers queued on source
00506                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &queued);
00507 
00508                 // Remove number of buffers from source
00509                 if (queued) 
00510                 {
00511                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, queued, mBuffers);
00512 
00513                         // Any problems?
00514                         if ( alGetError() ) Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Unable to unqueue buffers");
00515                 }
00516         }
00517         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00518         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::pause()
00519         {               
00520                 if(mSource == AL_NONE) return;
00521 
00522                 alSourcePause(mSource);
00523         }
00524         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00525         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::play()
00526         {       
00527                 if(isPlaying()) return;
00528 
00529                 // Grab a source if not already attached
00530                 if (mSource == AL_NONE)
00531                         if ( !OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().requestSoundSource(this) )
00532                                 return;
00533         
00534                 // Set play flag
00535                 mPlay = true;
00536 
00537                 // Play source
00538                 alSourcePlay(mSource);  
00539                 if ( alGetError() ) Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Unable to play sound");
00540         }
00541         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00542         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::stop()
00543         {
00544                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00545                 {
00546                         // Remove audio data from source
00547                         _dequeue();
00548 
00549                         // Stop playback
00550                         mPlay=false;
00551 
00552                         // Reset stream pointer
00553                         mAudioStream->seek(mFormatData->mAudioOffset);
00554 
00555                         // Reload audio data
00556                         _prebuffer();
00557 
00558                         // Give up source immediately if specfied
00559                         if (mGiveUpSource) OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().releaseSoundSource(this);
00560                 }
00561         }
